name: com.maksymhernets.autotranslateforunitylocalization
author: Hernets Maksym
description:
Auto translation plugin allows you to translate a project in just one click, thanks to other automation systems, such as loсalization system unity and google cloud translator.

  Main features: 
• Translation of text into hundreds of languages to choose from;
 Use 'Window/Auto localization/Auto Translate for String Tables'
• Automatic search text for translation in scenes or project prefabs.
 Use 'Window/Auto Localization/Search Text'
• Automatic search files for translation in scenes or project prefabs.
 Use 'Window/Auto Localization/Search Textures'
 Use 'Window/Auto Localization/Search Audio'

samples.description: The scene contains a short instruction on how to use the tool and also this scene can be used as a sample.
